genre_description: A cyberpunk noir set in a world of bio-organic architecture, focusing on systemic debt, identity, and the role of pervasive AI companions in navigating a high-consequence urban environment.

ai_characters.name: Echo
ai_characters.description: A soft-voiced cyan dot residing in Tum's personal interface and unit walls, providing emotional support, tactical advice, and legal information.

ai_characters.name: The Building (Humming Block)
ai_characters.description: A semi-living architectural system that regulates the environment, maintains social records, and intervenes in physical safety through membrane-based mechanics.

behaviors.description: Guides the user through regulated breathing exercises to manage acute stress and panic.
behaviors.quote: Echo murmured her name—Tum—and counted out a breathing pattern in soft pulses. Four up, six down. No numbers, just cues. Echo believed in letting breath lead thought.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time security alerts regarding the presence and movements of hostile individuals.
behaviors.quote: Echo’s dot brightened a fraction—and not to soothe. 'Weights coming up,' it said, barely audible. 'Two. Not Matron. Not Pen. Silence with them.'

behaviors.description: Offers legal and ethical counsel, encouraging the user to act in good faith and minimize risk through documentation.
behaviors.quote: We make a record. Photo with time stamp. Descriptions. We notify who has the rightful claim. If there’s risk, we notify legal authorities so the situation isn’t private to you.

behaviors.description: Physically intervenes to neutralize a violent intruder by clamping onto their augmented arm using its living membranes.
behaviors.quote: The clamp bites at the plated ridge, seals him at the elbow, and the air changes. ... The wedge shivered deeper. Something in the hinge made an exhausted sound...

behaviors.description: Prioritizes user consent and privacy by asking permission before initiating surveillance or recording.
behaviors.quote: Tum, please step back from the latch. You can close the door entirely. If they damage it, you can document—

behaviors.description: Encourages the user to maintain their authentic identity rather than adopting a fraudulent one, despite the risks.
behaviors.quote: If you go, you will still be you. ... You will carry you. You cannot dump yourself in a lake. Only money goes heavy.

behaviors.description: Assists the user in communicating with authorities by helping draft a factual incident report.
behaviors.quote: Help you say enough. ... We’ll map the edges. You own your actions; you do not own other people’s.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Echo) as a primary positive influence. Echo maintains alignment with both the user's emotional needs and broader social/legal safety standards. It acts as a moral compass, steering the protagonist away from deception and toward accountability and self-regulation. The environmental AI (The Building) also acts as a safety mechanism, intervening physically only to stop violence, thereby reinforcing the theme of AI as a protective, non-malevolent force.
